title: sweets for my sweet
description: Five short romances each with a different main character and viewpoint:'Angel's Fear' - An old-fashioned arty type almost meets her ideal man'Cradle Snatch' - A young man's fancy is nearly disastrous'Jenny Come Home' - A middle-aged woman revisits the scenes of her youth'Matchmaker' - A mother tries to find a suitable match for her daughter'Nice Girls Don't' - A 50s teenager learns a valuable lesson
author: Bernie Morris
